USA: Juan Rodríguez Cabrillo landed in what is now San Diego Bay and named it "San Miguel".
Sweden: Nils Dacke starts a peasant uprising in Småland, which is defeated the following year.
Peru: The Viceroyalty of Peru was established.
Ireland: The Irish parliament passed the Crown of Ireland Act, which established a Kingdom of Ireland to be ruled by Henry VIII and his successors.
Cuba: The Spanish crown abandons the encomienda colonial land settlement system.
Colombia: Francisco de Orellana sails the length of the Amazon River
Belgium: Francis I of France appoints Claude, Duke of Guise as governor of the Duchy of Luxembourg.
